https://tmrev.io/movie/5124-Comrades in Dreams 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Four lives that could not be more different and a single passion that unites them: the unconditional love for their cinemas, somewhere at the end of the world. Comrades in Dreams brings together six cinema makers from North Korea, America, India and Africa and follows their efforts to make their audiences dream every night. Comrades in Dreams
